channel.title: Stuck After Getting 357
channel.description:
Can't figure out where to go...
I'd post a screenshot but steam seems to be locked up right now and it's showing me the default placeholder workshop image.
So that guard tells me there's supplies in the back and I grab the magnum. I go back out and ask him to follow and he agrees. I've been down in the lower part of the room below the walkway and can't find any buttons/vents/ladders/hatches/doors/windows to go through.

item.title: Stuck After Getting 357
item.dc:creator: tomkeb
item.description:
Go to the flooded room and get to the vent.

Read full topic
